item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Biography I am a Senior Staff Research Scientist at Google Research, working in computer vision and machine learning. Most recently, I lead a team of scientists and engineers on developing vision techniques for mobile products, such as Google’s first venture info Face Unlock on Pixel 4 & 4XL (2019) with NIR sensors, and Pixel 7 & 7 Pro (2022), Pixel Fold & 7a and Pixel 8 & 8 Pro (2023) with only commodity RGB sensors.

item.title: Interns / Students
item.description: Yiyou Sun (University of Wisconsin-Madison/Sharon Li), 2022 “Rethinking Domain Generalization for Face Anti-spoofing: Separability and Alignment” Paper Code Video Giannis Daras (UT Austin/Alexandros Dimakis), 2021 “Solving Inverse Problems with NerfGANs” Paper Jason Chong (UIUC/David Froysth), 2020 “Retrieve in Style: Unsupervised Facial Feature Transfer and Retrieval” Project Paper Code Shlok Mishra (UMD/David Jacobs), 2020 “Improved Detection of Face Presentation Attacks Using Image Decomposition” Paper

item.title: Services
item.description: Area Chair IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2023 ACM International Conference on Multimodal Interaction (ICMI), 2020 ACM International Conference on Multimodal Interaction (ICMI), 2019 IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2019 IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2018 Organizing Committee ICMI 2021 (Sponsorship Chair) Conference Review Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR), 2014–present International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV), 2015–present European Conference on Computer Vision (ECCV), 2012–present Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2015–present Asian Conference on Compute Vision (ACCV), 2012–2014 AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI), 2016–present Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS), 2019–present International Conference on Multimodal Interaction (ICMI), 2018–present Affective Computing and Intelligent Interaction (ACII), 2015 Journal Review
